ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows how to create multi-pane stock charts using the SciStockChart control
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Simple example which shows how to create a stock chart using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.TradeChart.SciStockChart.html']SciStockChart Type[/url] control. This control allows easy creation of stock charts and also has default interaction applied, including Zooming, Panning, Mousewheel zoom and Cursors.
[b][i]Example Usage[/i][/b]
- Pan by selecting Pan and dragging the chart. - Zoom by selecting zoom and zooming the chart. - Drag XAxis or YAxis to scale. - Mousewheel zoom. - Double click to reset zoom. - Hover to show the X-Y Cursor.
